name: Rock Gloves
description: Favored weapons of Ba Sing Se's secret police force, known as the Dai Li.

name: Slinky Tank
description: Stone vehicles provided both transportation and protection during the invasion of the Fire Nation.

name: Surface Rocks
description: Largse rocks used as projectiles of Royal Earthbender Guards.

name: Blue Fire
description: Bend completely blue flames, which are hotter than the orange flames.

name: Combustionbending
description: Ignite objects with their mind instead of traditional firebending methods.

name: Lightningbending
description: Manipulate lightning by separating the yin and yang energies.

name: Shozin Comet
description: Formerly known as the Great Comet.

name: Trebuchets
description: Large weapons to conduct long-range artilery warfare.

name: Wall of Flames
description: Wall of concentrated flames acts as a barrier to incoming attacks.

name: Bloodbending
description: Ability that allows waterbender to manipulate person's movement.

name: Club
description: A blunt force weapon used for striking. Mostly used by Sokka.

name: Full Moon
description: Enhance the ability of water bending.

name: Ice Claws
description: Drawing water around the fingers and freezing it.

name: Ice Prison
description: This technique covers an opponent in a prison made of ice.

name: Tangle Mine
description: Military weapons invented by Hakoda to aid the Southern Water Tribe's quest to defeat the Fire Nation.

name: Wolf Armor
description: Protective battle gear worn by the warriors of the Southern Water Tribe.
